seo.description: Door-to-door bus directions from Hostel Brikette to Salerno via Amalfi: where to board, buy tickets, read timetables, and change at Amalfi.

callouts.tip: Need other transport options? Open the %HOWTO:how-to-get-here|How to Get Here overview% for ferries, taxis, and mixed itineraries.

sections.title: Timetable and planning
sections.body: Check the latest schedules on %URL:https://www.positano.com/en/bus-schedule|Positano.com%. Look up both legs and allow transfer time in Amalfi.

sections.title: Walk from the hostel to the stop
Buy your ticket and wait for boarding
